title: Weston-super-Mare
name: Boat Trips
content: Trips around Weston Bay lasting for an hour by www.mwmarine.org Tel...01934-636734 and also a longer day trip to the nature reserve of Steep Holm and Flatholm Island in the Bristol Channel. The MV Balmoral and the PS Waverley occasionally call in at Weston.  Details from Tourist Information Centre
